chain.description: Chain x amount of messages together

yell.description: Yell at a user or make the bot yell

channelcount.description: Counts total channels, including voice and text

quote.description: Gets a random quote and its author

contain.description: Contains a user to a certain channel, for a specified time

lock.description: Lock a user out of a certain channel for a specified amount of time. Use no arg to toggle it on/off instead of using an interval.
